page.description: The page menu lets you select the different UX builder pages that allow you to construct a UX component.

section.description: Page options are listed below. When you first open the UX Builder the page menu will appear like this:

case.title: Overview
case.description: A basic intro page that describes the UX Component and how to get started.

case.title: UX > Controls
case.description: Specifies the controls and control properties that will appear in the UX.

case.title: UX > Properties
case.description: Specifies properties for the UX component.

case.title: UX > Data Binding
case.description: Bind UX controls with new or existing tables.

case.title: Events > Server-side
case.description: Allows you to set server-side events

case.title: Events > Client-side
case.description: Allows you to set Client-side events

case.title: Code > Javascript functions
case.description: Allows you to add javascript to a UX, edit javascript functions, and add javascript actions.

case.title: Code > Xbasic functions
case.description: Allows you to add and manipulate Xbasic function

case.title: Information
case.description: Allows you to record information about the UX.
